author: buscob
msg: Better rendering of screenlet title bars in Dropping Crumbs theme

author: buscob
msg: Moved the "CatalogTabBar" Menus from the "body" decorator-section to the "pre-body" decorator section in the CommonCatalogDecorator.
This makes better the rendering of themes such as Dropping Crumbs.

author: jleroux
msg: Partially fix an issue I discussed with Akash on dev ML on how to format decimals in prices
* I removed unused currency.decimal.format calls in CheckOutEvents class
* Also removed unused priceNumberFormat in UtilFormatOut class
Still have to fix 11 harcoded  "##0.00" in ftl files using ofbizCurrency
